parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the formation leader of a given unit. This is often the same as the group leader, but not always, for example in cases when a unit is ordered to follow another unit.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Object]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''formLeader''' unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] -  
the leader of the formation is returned. If used on a dead unit, the returned value is [[objNull]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>? (formLeader player != leader player) :
 hint "The formation leader is different to the group leader!"</inner><close></pre></close></ext>

returns X

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[commandFollow]], [[doFollow]], [[formationLeader]], [[isFormationLeader]], [[leader]], [[selectLeader]], [[setLeader]]
</value></part></template>
